intro: Psychotria acutigemma subsp. acutigemma, commonly known as the sharp-leaved psychotria, is a species of flowering plant in the Rubiaceae family. It is native to the tropical regions of Central and South America, particularly in countries like Brazil and Colombia. The plant is characterized by its elliptical, dark green leaves with acute tips and clusters of small, white flowers. It often grows in humid, shaded environments within tropical rainforests. This species is notable for its chemical composition, which includes various alkaloids, some of which have been studied for their potential pharmacological properties.
